questions.question: What is the primary purpose of organizations and institutions?

options.a: To serve specific purposes and achieve goals

questions.question: Why are multiple positions necessary within an organization?

options.a: Because the organization has complex goals
options.b: To divide the organization into departments

questions.question: What role do human resources play in an organization?

options.a: They are responsible for recruiting new staff
options.c: They bring knowledge, skills, and dedication to the organization

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of a role within an educational institution?

options.a: The process of filling vacant positions
options.b: The process of recruiting employees only
options.c: The function of hiring, developing, appraising, and retaining employees
options.d: The evaluation of employees after hiring

questions.question: What is a key benefit of a well-planned staffing strategy?

options.a: It leads to a lack of roles
options.b: It ensures vacancies are filled quickly
options.c: It ensures the right individuals are placed in the right roles
options.d: It reduces the number of employees in an organization

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT part of the staffing process?
What could happen if an organization has inefficient staffing?

options.b: It may lead to inefficiencies and unmet goals
options.c: It will ensure that all roles are fulfilled
options.d: It will reduce the number of staff required

questions.question: Which is an example of a staffing mistake in an educational institution?

options.a: Hiring a teacher with poor subject knowledge
options.b: Hiring a support staff member with excellent organizational skills
options.d: Assigning the right tasks to the right people

questions.question: Why is selection an important part of the staffing process?

options.a: It ensures the organization hires employees only for internal positions
options.b: It prevents mismatches between roles and employee competencies
options.c: It evaluates the performance of employees
options.d: It monitors the day-to-day activities of employees
